QuestData.Title: A Revenant's Vengeance
QuestData.Description: I am Hydronis, a servant of Neptulon the Tidehunter, Lord over all waters.$b$bAzshara and her sinister naga have arrayed themselves against my master, and seek a war with him. This is the first battle in what shall surely be a long struggle.$b$bI have fought bitterly, $r, and have grown weary.$b$bIt seems that my actions here have attracted the attention of their priestess.$b$bAlone, I haven't the strength to overcome her. but perhaps together, we may prevail.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hydronis wants you to mount him and defeat Priestess Valishj.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to assist the water revenant?
